guiTeacher.components

Class ScrollablePane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • guiTeacher.userInterfaces.ComponentContainer
              • guiTeacher.components.ScrollablePane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Scrollable, Visible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullFunctionPane, ScrollableDragablePane

    public class ScrollablePane
extends ComponentContainer
implements Clickable, Scrollable
    A Pane that is Scrollable. Note that a ScrollablePane requires a FocusController (usually a FullFunctionScreen)
    Author:
    bnockles
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
